org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass

Class ClearPassController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.web.context.support.WebApplicationObjectSupport
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.WebContentGenerator
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
            • org.jasig.cas.extension.clearpass.ClearPassController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    Deprecated. 
    As of 4.1, use CacheCredentialsMetaDataPopulator instead.

    @Deprecated
public final class ClearPassController
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
    A controller that returns the password based on some external authentication/authorization rules. The recommended method is to use the Apereo CAS Client for Java and its proxy authentication features.
    Since:
    1.0
